TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITransformProvider

summary.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can be moved, resized, or rotated within a two-dimensional space.

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can be moved, resized, or rotated within a two-dimensional space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作控制項模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern. 此控制項模式的支援不限於桌面上的物件。Support for this control pattern is not limited to objects on the desktop. 實作此控制項模式必須也是容器物件的子系，只要子系可以移動、 調整大小或旋轉自由在容器的範圍內。This control pattern must also be implemented by the children of a container object as long as the children can be moved, resized, or rotated freely within the boundaries of the container.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Move (double x, double y);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Move(float64 x, float64 y) cil managed
Public Sub Move (x As Double, y As Double)
public: void Move(double x, double y);
abstract member Move : double * double -> unit

param.name: x
param.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.

param.name: y
param.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使得產生的螢幕位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法以鍵盤或滑鼠存取物件。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，最上層的視窗時移離螢幕完全或子物件移容器的檢視區界限之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置最接近所要求的螢幕座標越好，覆寫為容器範圍內的頂端或左邊的座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 下列範例顯示自訂控制項可以移動這個方法可能實作。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control that can be moved. [!code-csharp[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Move](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/CSharp/TransformFragment.cs#move)] [!code-vb[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Move](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/visualbasic/transformfragment.vb#move)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Resize (double width, double height);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Resize(float64 width, float64 height) cil managed
Public Sub Resize (width As Double, height As Double)
public: void Resize(double width, double height);
abstract member Resize : double * double -> unit

param.name: width
param.span: The new width of the window, in pixels.

span.span: The new width of the window, in pixels.

param.name: height
param.span: The new height of the window, in pixels.

span.span: The new height of the window, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在控制項上呼叫時，支援分割窗格，這個方法可能都有副作用，調整其他相鄰的窗格大小。When called on a control that supports split panes, this method can have the side effect of resizing other contiguous panes. 無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使得產生的螢幕位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法以鍵盤或滑鼠存取物件。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，最上層的視窗時移離螢幕完全或子物件移容器的檢視區界限之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置最接近所要求的螢幕座標越好，覆寫為容器範圍內的頂端或左邊的座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 下列範例顯示自訂控制項可以調整大小的這個方法可能實作。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control that can be resized. [!code-csharp[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Resize](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/CSharp/TransformFragment.cs#resize)] [!code-vb[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Resize](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/visualbasic/transformfragment.vb#resize)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Rotate (double degrees);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Rotate(float64 degrees) cil managed
Public Sub Rotate (degrees As Double)
public: void Rotate(double degrees);
abstract member Rotate : double -> unit

param.name: degrees
param.span: The number of degrees to rotate the control.

span.span: The number of degrees to rotate the control.

param.span: A positive number rotates clockwise; a negative number rotates counterclockwise.

span.span: A positive number rotates clockwise; a negative number rotates counterclockwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使得產生的螢幕位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法以鍵盤或滑鼠存取物件。An object cannot be moved, resized or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，最上層的視窗時移離螢幕完全或子物件移容器的檢視區界限之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置最接近所要求的螢幕座標越好，覆寫為容器範圍內的頂端或左邊的座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 下列範例示範一個可能的實作，這個方法無法旋轉的自訂控制項。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control that cannot be rotated. [!code-csharp[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Rotate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/CSharp/TransformFragment.cs#rotate)] [!code-vb[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Rotate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/visualbasic/transformfragment.vb#rotate)]
